subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Important as Asante Samuel’s cover skills are, his value to the Atlanta Falcons also lies in his intangibles because he is one of the few players on the team with postseason experience.
snippet: Important as Asante Samuel’s cover skills are, his value to the Atlanta Falcons also lies in his intangibles because he is one of the few players on the team with postseason experience.
